**********
ISF Reader
**********

Read tek scope isf files as a numpy array.

.. code-block:: python

    import isfreader

    data = isfreader.read_file('T0000CH1.ISF')
    data[:, 0]  # Time column (Does not always start at 0)
    data[:, 1]  # Data (Voltage) column
    print(data.shape)
    print(data.dtype)
